#summary Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus

This page covers biological details of component Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Diencephalon -> Thalamus (FD.TH) -> Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus (FCA.FD.TH.MD) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: nucleus
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaEPA Neocortical Brain - Execution Planning Area]
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Attention, planning, organization, abstract thinking, multi-tasking, and active memory
  * *Notes to function*: Relay AM to FCA.LPFC, FCA.OMPFC
